title: Maksym Kuchynskyi
text:
Maksym Vitaliyovych Kuchynskyi (; born 28 June 1988) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> Ukrainian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Karpaty%20Lviv">Karpaty Lviv</a>.
Career.
Kuchynskyi is a product of the Metalurh Zaporizhzhia Youth Sportive School System in his native <a href="Zaporizhzhia">Zaporizhzhia</a>. He spent his career in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Second%20League">Ukrainian Second League</a> and <a href="Ukrainian%20First%20League">Ukrainian First League</a>, but in summer 2018 signed a contract with the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> club Karpaty.
He made his debut for <a href="FC%20Karpaty%20Lviv">Karpaty Lviv</a> in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> in the match against <a href="FC%20Oleksandriya">Oleksandriya</a> on 22 July 2018.
He was called up to the <a href="Ukraine%20national%20under-19%20football%20team">Ukraine national under-19 football team</a> in March 2007, and spent 3 matches for this representation.
Personal life.
His father Vitaliy Kuchynskyi was an amateur football player.
